title: Looking for decorative Cyrillic fonts
content:
Hey people,

i´m looking for decorative cyrillic style fonts.  
Decoration like the attached picture has.  
Someone some suggestions?

Thanks a lot

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Bild 1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122040851/http:/typophile.com/files/Bild%201_3.jpg) | 190.52 KB |

 [‹ (x) Blackletter on Sean Paul "The Trinity" album cover - Agincourt {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122040851/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47793 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Wide black sans "Freitag" black box logo - Antique Olive Nord {Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122040851/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47788 "Go to next forum topic")
author: boredoleg

comments.content: I doubt you’ll find anything as decorative as your sample as a ready-made digital font. My suggestion would be to look for something suitable with nice lettershapes and add the decorations yourself.
